FuncDef: The display mirror instance location command displays the configuration of port mirroring instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a mirroring instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query the configuration of a port mirroring instance, run the display mirror instance location command.
Prerequisites
A mirroring instance has been configured.
